IronRuby
========

http://ironruby.net

IronRuby is a Open Source implementation of the Ruby programming language for 
.NET, heavily relying on Microsoft's Dynamic Language Runtime.

Package
-------

  /bin           IronRuby binaries, ir.exe, iirb, irake, igem, iri, irdoc, etc ...
  /lib           Standard library
  /silverlight   Silverlight binaries for Silverlight 2 and Silverlight 3 Beta. See
                 /Silverlight/README.txt for more information.
  CHANGELOG.txt  Significant changes for each release
  CPL.txt        Common Public License
  MSPL.html      Microsoft Public License
  README.txt     This file
